â€œGorilla Glue #5 has it's own uniqueness to the strain.GG#5 hit's you hard in to 30-45 min's session after medicating and your stuck in chair in daze.

â€œHarambe would have also liked GG#5.

Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer.

Pros: Good for pain relief and relaxation. Hits the body first then creeps into the mind for a uplifting, occasionally giggly feeling. Can help with sleep.

Cons: Dry mouth. Harder to find as most dispensaries carry GG4

Overall/Other: More indica than GG4, this strain hits the body more than the mind. Normal draw and exhale, has a piney ...â€

â€œI saw this strain at have a heart one day they only had grams. I bought a gram, it was amazing instant relaxation,no pain in my back, I was in a happy state of mind.

â€œMight be a hybrid but acts completely like an indica. Very strong effects leaving you literally glued to the couch or bed. Doesnt make you as hungry as much as indicas but it does have that intense relaxing feeling that might just knock you out for a few hours.â€
